A) \(\mathrm{\dfrac{3}{16}} \)
B) \(\mathrm{\dfrac{1}{4}} \)
C) \(\mathrm{\dfrac{5}{16}} \)
D) \(\mathrm{\dfrac{3}{8}} \)
E) \(\mathrm{\dfrac{7}{16}} \)
A B C D E
